**Welcome to Dan Carter's Port Scanner Codespace!**

To run the scanner, use:
```bash
python src/port-scanner.py <target-ip> <port-range> <thread-count>
```
Example:
```bash
python src/port-scanner.py 192.168.1.1 1-100 10
 This script is intended for educational and authorized use only. Do not scan targets without explicit permission. Unauthorized scanning may be illegal. The author is not liable for any misuse or damage caused by this tool.```
